item.title: Report E-2024060527
item.description:
Report E-2024060527

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-26T15:13:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-05
  • City: SCOTT
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 0.5-gallons of Urethane Converter 133 (hazardous - UN1263) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to only the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS. The released product, 4 damaged cans, and oil-dri was placed into a 20-gallon poly drum and staged in OS&D for disposal. There were no drains, soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release.
